pixlab

Class Picture

  • java.lang.Object
    • pixlab.SimplePicture
      • pixlab.Picture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DigitalPicture

    public class Picture
extends SimplePicture
    A class that represents a picture. This class inherits from SimplePicture and allows the student to add functionality to the Picture class. Tricia Flynn emoved project solutions and their methods
    Author:
    Barbara Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu, Tricia Flynn
